reviews.I think if you do something and it turns: I think if you do something and it turns out pretty good, then you should go do something else wonderful, not dwell on it for too long.
reviews.You can't connect the dots looking forwa: You can't connect the dots looking forward, you can only connect them looking backwards.
reviews.Lola, I want to express my gratitude to: Lola, I want to express my gratitude to the entire kindergarten staff. There is such a drastic difference between what children were like at the beginning of the year and how they have grown up now. Today was a very rich and interesting program. Complex numbers. We really liked it. Great concert. We got a real aesthetic pleasure. You did well.
reviews.commint: Look what parents of our students say about us.
